articles.description:

✨ Future derivative innovation
Check it out! https://youtu.be/pIPSQ09muYo

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
RT Nathan Howard
Learned a ton from this conversation with @reegannotraygan and @alpinechicken. Options are a critical tool for expressing financial views in a market and we’re barely scratching the surface for how that will look on-chain.
DeFi Pulse 🍇: 🧱 Did you miss the latest Money Legos featuring the @opyn_ team? Watch the full replay!
Here is what we covered:
❓ How retail users utilize options
💡 DeFi vs. Tradfi options innovation
💫 Composability of options
👥 Opyn user growth
Press ▶️ :
 https://youtu.be/8aShXRkalMg

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
Re Squeeth (standing for squared eth) is the first on-chain power perpetual. It’s similar to an option, but without expiries or strike prices, and enables no liquidations for longs.
Squeeth is an ERC20 token that tracks the price of ETH, raised to the power of two.

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
Re Opyn laid the foundation for options infrastructure in DeFi when they launched as the first options protocol. 
Opyn’s goal then and now has remained the same: to empower others through an inclusive, fair, and open financial system.
